qas.question: How many Digimon movies have been released in Japan?
How many movies were directly connected to the anime series?
What year was Digimon: The movie released in the US/Canada?
How many Digimon movies have been released in the United States?
What were the first seven not connected to?
What were the first three Japanese movies released in the United States and Canada?

plausible_answers.text: X-Evolution and Ultimate Power! Activate Burst Mode

qas.question: What were the only two movies distributed internationally?

context: There have been <a0_0><b3_0>nine<b3_0/> Digimon movies<a0_0/> released in Japan. The first <a1_0>seven<a1_0/> were directly connected to <b4_0>their respective anime series<b4_0/>; Digital Monster X-Evolution originated from the Digimon Chronicle merchandise line. All movies except <b6_0>X-Evolution and Ultimate Power! Activate Burst Mode<b6_0/> have been released and distributed internationally. Digimon: The Movie, released in the U.S. and Canada territory by Fox Kids through 20th Century Fox on <a2_0><b5_0>October 6, 2000<a2_0/>,<b5_0/> consists of the union of the first three Japanese movies.
